message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money evenly.
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not giving up 50% of the money. Let's try 55/45.
I want 58, you get 42. I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Let's go back to the even split. Inflation is hurting us both, and I'd rather we both get a fair share than continue to argue.
I want 60, you get 40. This is my previous offer, and I think it's more reasonable now that inflation is taking a bigger toll on your share.
I'm willing to concede to a 45/55 split, but that's my final offer.  Inflation is hurting us both, and I don't want to keep losing money while we argue.
